description: Senior Nannies provides elderly with in-home care. Home Health Aids (HHA) or Certified Nursing Assistants (CNA's) provided for live in cases and hourly cases. Assisted daily living activities include ambulating, bathing, dressing ,eating, toileting, transference, medication reminders, meals, light housekeeping, errands, doctor's appointments, laundry, bed and linen change, and ostomy care.
name: SENIOR NANNIES HOME CARE SERVICES, LLC.
